TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: To friends returning from the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon:</color> I have have decided to try to run more launches using the alternate power source.
CASSAVA: It is all I can think to do right now..
CASSAVA: Please seek me through the <color=orange>Construction Yard's</color> projection wall if you have need of my presence.
DAZ: My love, I hear there is some trouble at the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> that will require additional sets of eyes.
DAZ: If I remember correctly, there should be a voyager stone to the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> in the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop's loft.</color>
DAZ: I'm sure Oeno would like as much help as possible.. Would you like to join us in this change of task?
CASSAVA: Please assist her in my stead, Daz. A change of task is.. not what I need at this moment.
